sentence.text: Among the proteins enriched in LO, cytokeratin 18 (CK18) was one of the most abundant (within the top 5th percentile) and was used to develop an assay to detect LO in the circulation and tissues of apoptotic process and patients with prostate cancer.
These observations indicate that LO represent a discrete EV cardiac muscle tissue development that may play a distinct role in tumor progression and that may be a source of cancer-specific markers
